word:
There need to be far more lessons in the ministry of the word of true conversion than of the arguments of the 
                                                                           197
doctrines; for it is far easier and more natural for the heart that is not under the control of the Spirit of Christ to choose doctrinal subjects rather than the practical. There are many Christless discourses given [that are] no more acceptable to God than was the offering of Cain. They are not in harmony with God.
